issue.title: [JS] support for LargeUtf8 type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16528](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16528). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Does JS library support [LargeUtf8](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/a8479e9c252482438b6fc2bc0383ac5cf6a09d59/format/Schema.fbs#L165)?

I'm getting error trying to read arrow produced by rust lib:
`Unrecognized type: "LargeUtf8"`
